description: Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement for 6 x 16 Apple MacBook Pro s (Z1AH) or equivalent, as per the List of Deliverables in the request for Quotation. Delivery Destination Area: Ottawa, ON. Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award or by March 31, 2024, whichever is sooner Security Requirements: N/A.
full_summary:
===============

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Reference
 Covrersion to an compact format below

**Procurement Number (Nunéro de l'approvisionnement):** SSC-24-00025180:T  
**Request for Proposal (RFP) Number (Numéro de la demande de proposition):** BPM020559/25180  
**Publication Date (Date de publication):** 2024-01-16  
**Tender Closing Date (Date limite d'adjudication):** 2024-01-29T14:00:00  
**Procurement Category (Catégorie d'approvisionnement):** Goods and Services (TD)  
**Notice Type (Type d'avis):** R- Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)  
**Procurement Method (Méthode d'approvisionnement):** Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)  
**Request for Proposal Title (Titre de la demande de propositions):** SSC Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro’s (Z1AH) or equivalent For Public Services and Procurement Canada- Amendment 000  
**GSIN (Classe de produits):** *N7010  
**GSIN Description (Description de la classe de produits):** Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration  

### Brief Description 
Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement for 6 x 16” Apple MacBook Pro’s (Z1AH) or equivalent to be delivered to the following address: [Shared Services Canada 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca). The delivery date must be no later than 30 federal government working days from contract award or by March 31, 2024, whichever is sooner.

### Submission Guidelines
All bids must be submitted through the P2P portal for RFQ Submission by the specified date, time, and place. Please access the solicitation and submit your bid through the following link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login). The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Contact Information
All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to:
